name: @giraphql/schema-builder-root
description: A strongly typed code first schema builder for GraphQL

scripts.build: yarn refs && beemo typescript --build --reference-workspaces && yarn build-esm
scripts.build-esm: ESM_BUILD=true yarn create-config && ESM_BUILD=true beemo typescript --build --reference-workspaces --transpile-only && yarn create-config
scripts.ci: yarn run build && yarn run test && yarn run lint
scripts.release: lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate --changelog-preset conventional-changelog-beemo --create-release github --push && lerna publish from-git --pre-dist-tag preview
scripts.preview: yarn prerelease && lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-prerelease --changelog-preset conventional-changelog-beemo --push && lerna publish from-git --pre-dist-tag preview

author: Michael Hayes
